themes: Coming to Meet (personnel manager of the tribe)
recognizing the right ego to fulfill transformation
smelling what/who is healthy for the tribe

classical.hd_quote: The establishment of frameworks as the result of interaction.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Builds a clear container before engaging; knows the tribe needs rules to prosper.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Doesn’t apply conditions because it wants harmony / friendship more than correctness.

classical.hd_quote: The development and management of a proper collective structure.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Focuses on the objective and organizes people around it.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Over-focus on goals → ignores weaker elements → qualitative failure in the human field.

lines.group_role: operations / systems manager for the tribe

classical.hd_quote: The failure to interact based on circumstances.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Senses the other’s ego power and prepares or withdraws.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Makes/breaks bonds too fast; fear of past egos blocks correct alliances.

lines.group_role: tribal interference detector / ego risk router

classical.hd_quote: The refusal to engage in hypocritical interaction.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Externalizes the tribal management style through blunt, transparent interaction.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Can appear cold/indifferent; may later return to rejected contacts pragmatically.

classical.hd_quote: The ability to transform interaction with inferior elements into the energizing of progressive processes.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Places everyone where they can contribute, while preserving material immunity of the tribe.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Becomes abusive / dictatorial: “I have the power and you don’t. Do what you’re told.”

lines.group_role: tribal immune-system controller / senior personnel strategist

classical.hd_quote: The awareness of patterns, which ensures one's instinctive well-being.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Pulls back from ordinary meetings to wait for the truly correct ego / new form.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Detached, hard to access, may bolster ego at others’ expense if misaligned.

meta.provenance: All hd_title and hd_quote values taken verbatim (<25 words) from Ra Uru Hu, Line Companion, archive.org stream/LineCompanion, around lines 11548–11749.
